titles.title: Providing for a committee of two Members to be appointed by the House to inform the President.

action.text: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 594, H. Res. 608 is considered passed House.

bill.summary: 10/20/1998--Introduced. Provides for appointment of a committee of two Members of the House of Representatives to inform the President that the House has completed its business of the session and is ready to adjourn.
